title: Oxford Road's Dan Granger |  Rattlesnakes In Whiskey | Theodore Roosevelt Love Affair |  1978 Eagle Rare
itunes:title: Oxford Road's Dan Granger |  Rattlesnakes In Whiskey | Theodore Roosevelt Love Affair |  1978 Eagle Rare
description: Oxford Road Ad agency owner Dan Granger joins the show to sip some ultra rare bourbon, including a 1978 Eagle Rare. Fred talks to the young businessman about the state of podcasting and the analytics business, while Dan drops his love and knowledge for former President Teddy Roosevelt, who, of course, played a major role in American whiskey. Some history tidbits dropped: What happened to studying the aging of barrels? Why did distillers add rattlesnakes to whiskey in 1800s? And who used to distiller Eagle Rare before Buffalo Trace?
